DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate efficacy and safety of HL-040XC in patients with essential hypertension and hyperlipidemia
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of HL-040XC in Essential Hypertension and Hyperlipidemia
DOC.criteria: Aged between 18 and 80 years History of essential hypertension and hyperlipidemia Able to sign informed consent At screening, SBP ≥ 180mmHg or DBP ≥ 110mmHg or LDLC > 250mg/dL or TG ≥ 400mg/dL Has a history of hypersensitivity to Angiotensin Ⅱ receptor blocker or HMGCoA reductase inhibitor or component of this drug
